attributes.action: Offset the cost of the Furlough against the spiraling cost of HS2
attributes.additional_details: Putting money where its needed most - COVID19 has cost the Country billions and we need the finance to rebuild our deeply wounded economy
attributes.background: Cancel or at least suspend it for future debate

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Cancel HS2 and use the money for the NHS and local economies, post Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/311642

Commit to a public review of HS2 project and suspend all on-going work now: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/314520

Repeal the 2013 and 2017 HS2 Hybrid Bills halting all HS2 works immediately: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300170
